verses.verse: And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> Yet <S%H5750><s%> will I bring <S%H935><s%> one <S%H259><s%> plague <S%H5061><s%> more upon <S%H5921><s%> Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> and upon <S%H5921><s%> Egypt; <S%H4714><s%> afterwards <S%H310><s%> <S%H3651><s%> he will let you go <S%H7971><s%> hence: <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2088><s%> when he shall let you go, <S%H7971><s%> he shall surely thrust you out <S%H1644><s%> <S%H1644><s%> <S%H853><s%> hence <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2088><s%> altogether. <S%H3617><s%>

Speak <S%H1696><s%> now <S%H4994><s%> in the ears <S%H241><s%> of the people, <S%H5971><s%> and let every man <S%H376><s%> borrow <S%H7592><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> <S%H854><s%> his neighbor, <S%H7453><s%> and every woman <S%H802><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> <S%H854><s%> her neighbor, <S%H7468><s%> jewels <S%H3627><s%> of silver, <S%H3701><s%> and jewels <S%H3627><s%> of gold. <S%H2091><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> <S%H853><s%> favor <S%H2580><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the Egyptians. <S%H4714><s%> Moreover <S%H1571><s%> the man <S%H376><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> was very <S%H3966><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of Pharaoh's <S%H6547><s%> servants, <S%H5650><s%> and in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the people. <S%H5971><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> Thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> About midnight <S%H2676><s%> <S%H3915><s%> will I <S%H589><s%> go out <S%H3318><s%> into the midst <S%H8432><s%> of Egypt: <S%H4714><s%>

And all <S%H3605><s%> the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> shall die, <S%H4191><s%> from the firstborn <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1060><s%> of Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> that sitteth <S%H3427><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> his throne, <S%H3678><s%> even unto <S%H5704><s%> the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> of the maidservant <S%H8198><s%> that <S%H834><s%> is behind <S%H310><s%> the mill; <S%H7347><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> of beasts. <S%H929><s%>

And there shall be <S%H1961><s%> a great <S%H1419><s%> cry <S%H6818><s%> throughout all <S%H3605><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> such as <S%H834><s%> there was <S%H1961><s%> none <S%H3808><s%> like it, <S%H3644><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> shall be like it <S%H3644><s%> any more. <S%H3254><s%>

But against any <S%H3605><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> shall not <S%H3808><s%> a dog <S%H3611><s%> move <S%H2782><s%> his tongue, <S%H3956><s%> against man <S%H4480><s%> <S%H376><s%> or <S%H5704><s%> beast: <S%H929><s%> that <S%H4616><s%> ye may know <S%H3045><s%> how that <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> doth put a difference <S%H6395><s%> between <S%H996><s%> the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> and Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

And all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> thy servants <S%H5650><s%> shall come down <S%H3381><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me, and bow down themselves <S%H7812><s%> unto me, saying, <S%H559><s%> Get thee out, <S%H3318><s%> <S%H859><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> that <S%H834><s%> follow <S%H7272><s%> thee: and after <S%H310><s%> that <S%H3651><s%> I will go out. <S%H3318><s%> And he went out <S%H3318><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5973><s%> Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> in a great <S%H2750><s%> anger. <S%H639><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> shall not <S%H3808><s%> hearken <S%H8085><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> you; that <S%H4616><s%> my wonders <S%H4159><s%> may be multiplied <S%H7235><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> wonders <S%H4159><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Pharaoh: <S%H6547><s%> and the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hardened <S%H2388><s%> <S%H853><s%> Pharaoh's <S%H6547><s%> heart, <S%H3820><s%> so that he would not <S%H3808><s%> let <S%H853><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> go <S%H7971><s%> out of his land. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H776><s%>
